rules_text:
Foreshadow {5}{U}{U} [i](You may cast this spell for its foreshadow cost. If you do, also trigger its “dies” ability when it enters.)[/i]
Flying
When Morkrut Gryff dies, surveil 1, then draw a card. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)[/i]
